Job Title: Flow Inventory Lead 2nd shift

Location: Gastonia, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
7171 - Gastonia - 1600 Remount Rd, Gastonia, North Carolina, 28054 CarMax, the way your career should be!

General Summary

Under general supervision, responsible for daily reconciliation of vehicle inventory. Facilitates the direction of work and disseminates tasks from the Reconditioning Production Manager to Reconditioning Associates in the areas of zone maintenance, prep for delivery, vehicle receiving, inventory transfers, scanning and reconciliation of inventory, and vehicle movement (on and off lot). Reports behaviors, attendance, performance, and tardiness of Reconditioning Associates to Supervisor.

On as needed basis, responsible for Reconditioning Associate and Reconditioning Associate I and II duties including but not limited to, zone maintenance, prep for delivery, vehicle receiving, inventory scanning, vehicle movement (both on and off lot), basic vehicle detailing including car wash, wash bay, interior cleaning,/vacuuming, exterior cleanliness, completing cosmetic inspection, final quality inspections, paint touch-up, wet sanding and buffing.

Principal Duties And Responsibilities

Train and mentor associates in performance of standardized workDocument, improve and ensure compliance of standardized workFacilitate direction of work and tasks to Reconditioning Associates in all inventory areasEnsure timely performance of all inventory functionsDirect and approve work of vendorsPerform daily reconciliation of vehicle inventoryParticipate in problem solving and continuous improvement activitiesProvide auction supportProvide outstanding customer service to both internal and external customersComplete duties as assigned by Leads and Managers

Job Specifications

Position requires the following pre-requisites and ability:

Complete all training, on-line and hands-on including New Associate Orientation Training – Operations and Kronos Training.Accountable to Associate 1 Competency ModelMeet Reconditioning Associate, Reconditioning I and Reconditioning II Performance StandardsComplete Reconditioning Associate, Reconditioning Associate I II and IV Workstation CertificationsRead, interpret and transcribe data in order to maintain accurate recordsPerform multiple duties in a high-energy, fast-paced environmentLift objects that weigh as much as 50lbsSpeak and listen effectively in dealing with customers/associates, both in person and over the phoneComplete CarMax provided training in all functional areas of the inventory process, allowing for cross-training and full coverage of the inventory and detail area

Working Conditions

Indoor and outdoor environment; may include working at times in noisy and/or inclement weather conditions.Requires walking or standing for an extended periods of time.Wears CarMax clothing (acquired through company) at all times working in the store.Follows all CarMax, O.S.H.A., and EPA standards including the use of Personal Protective Equipment, and proper waste disposal in required areas.Adheres to all CarMax policies including, but not limited to: Attendance, Proper Recording of Time, Asset Protection, Safety and Standards of Professional Appearance.

About CarMax

CarMax disrupted the auto industry by delivering the honest, transparent and high-integrity experience customers want and deserve. This innovative thinking around the way cars are bought and sold has helped us become the nation’s largest retailer of used cars, with over 200 locations nationwide.

Our amazing team of more than 25,000 associates work together to deliver iconic customer experiences. Along the way, we help every associate grow their career and achieve their best, at work and in their community. We are recognized for our commitment to training and diversity and are one of the FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For®.

CarMax is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Upon an applicant's request, CarMax will consider reasonable accommodation to complete the CarMax Job Application .

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
